<!-- wp:etch/text {"metadata":{"name":"Text"},"content":"\u003c!-- wp:etch/raw-html {\u0022content\u0022:\u0022ndocument.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {n    const buttonThemes = document.querySelectorAll('[data-ui-button-theme]');n    const buttonGroups = document.querySelectorAll('[data-ui-button-group]');nn    function updateVisibility() {n        buttonThemes.forEach(theme =\u003e {n            const button = theme.querySelector('[data-ui-button]');n            if (button) {n                const computedStyle = window.getComputedStyle(button);n                const backgroundColor = computedStyle.backgroundColor;n                const isTransparent = backgroundColor === 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)' || backgroundColor === 'transparent';n                const buttonStyle = button.getAttribute('data-ui-button-style');n                n                if (isTransparent \u0026\u0026 buttonStyle === 'outline') {n                    theme.style.display = 'none';n                } else {n                    theme.style.display = isTransparent ? 'none' : '';n                }n            }n        });nn        buttonGroups.forEach(group =\u003e {n            const visibleThemes = group.querySelectorAll('[data-ui-button-theme]:not([style*=\u0022display: none\u0022])');n            group.style.display = visibleThemes.length === 0 ? 'none' : '';n        });nn        const groupTypes = ['primary', 'secondary', 'tertiary', 'accent', 'base', 'neutral'];n        n        groupTypes.forEach(type =\u003e {n            const group = document.querySelector(`[data-ui-button-group=\u0022${type}\u0022 i]`);n            if (group) {n                const optionBtnOutline = getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue(`--option-${type}-btn-outline`).trim();nn                if (optionBtnOutline !== 'on') {n                    const outlineButtons = group.querySelectorAll('[data-ui-button-style=\u0022outline\u0022]');n                    outlineButtons.forEach(button =\u003e {n                        button.style.display = 'none';n                    });n                } else {n                    const outlineButtons = group.querySelectorAll('[data-ui-button-style=\u0022outline\u0022]');n                    outlineButtons.forEach(button =\u003e {n                        button.style.display = '';n                    });n                }n            }n        });n    }nn    const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver(updateVisibility);n    buttonThemes.forEach(theme =\u003e resizeObserver.observe(theme));nn    updateVisibility(); // Initial updaten});\u0022,\u0022unsafe\u0022:\u0022true\u0022} --\u003e\n"} /-->
<!-- /wp:etch/element -->
